revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=PLW400 |revision= |asin=B006JG5S6U |price=100 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=Powerline Access Point, extender |fcc_date=01/19/2012 |fcc_id=Q87-PLW400 |ic_id=3839A-PLW400 |pcb_id=48SLC401.SGD |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.2 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5358C0 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand=Broadcom |cpu2_model=BCM60321 |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla2=1 |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9425G6JH-5 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5358C0 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=HomePlug AV |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Cisco_Extender_XXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Cisco_Extender_[0-9]{6}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=20:AA:4B, 58:6D:8F, C8:D7:19 |oui_eth=20:AA:4B, 58:6D:8F, C8:D7:19 }} {{TagLine|Powerline AV Wireless Network Extender}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=PLW400|pid=01t80000003K7beAAC}}
"48SLC401.SGD" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. {{see also|Linksys|Cisco|Wistron NeWeb}} PLWK400 is a kit containing this PLW400 and a [[Linksys PLE400]].
The user manual states the default SSID is ''CiscoXXXXX'' where :''XXXXX'' is the last 5 digits of the adapter serial number. The default SSID would appear to be either ''Cisco_Extender_XXXXX'' :(where ''XXXXX'' seems to be a number) or ''CiscoXXXXX'' <small>(maybe)</small>.
==Images== <gallery> File:PLW400 right-angle ,0.png|PLW400 </gallery>
